methods.name: unrekey
methods.desc: [admin] undo rekeying of escrowed address back to itself

methods.name: allocate_vp
methods.desc: [admin|op] allocate voting power. sends if account opted in, otherwise allocates a box for later claim

methods.name: dilute_unclaimed
methods.desc: [admin|op] Dilute unclaimed voting power of up to 4 accounts

methods.name: user_unfreeze
methods.desc:
[user] method to unfreeze. must be 1/3 and:
2/3: Axfer to an account with a nonzero balance (and the unclaimed account) 3/3: freeze of same account

methods.name: user_freeze
methods.desc: [user] pair of user_unfreeze, called as 3rd in group to freeze both accounts
